dictionary_deleteAll.message: Are you sure you want to delete ALL translations from the dictionary?

dictionary_deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this translation?

dictionary_description.message: Save translations in the dictionary to find them quickly later

dictionary_emptyDictionary.message: Dictionary is empty, start filling it by translating some text

dictionary_notFoundEntries.message: No translations matching these filters were found

editorWindow_message_invalidTitle.message: Module name must have at least one character

ext_description.message: Web page translation, text translation, dictionary, history, custom translators, all you need to break language barriers

history_control_selectEntry.description: Description in finite form "to pick" with explaining what this checkbox will do

history_message_clearHistoryConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to clear the history? All entries will be removed

history_message_deleteEntryConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

history_message_deleteSelectedEntriesCon.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected entries ($1)?

history_message_entriesNotFound.message: No translations found matching the filter

history_notification_disabled.message: History recording is disabled, so new entries will not appear. You can change this in <slot id=preferences>Preferences</slot>

pageTranslator_sitePreferences_autoTrans.message: Use common rules for this language

settings_message_importConfig_invalidFil.message: The provided config file is incorrect or corrupted, and cannot be processed

settings_message_resetConfig_confirm.message: Confirm to reset the settings to default values

settings_option_cache_clear_desc.message: If you notice translation errors or accidentally translate private texts while the cache is enabled, you can delete all data from the cache
settings_option_cache_clear_desc.description: Explanation for user about cases when it's useful to clear cache

settings_option_cache_enable_desc.message: When the cache is enabled, texts that have been translated before will be translated instantly without additional requests to the translation service

settings_option_cache_ignoreCase_desc.message: When enabled, cached translations will be used for texts with different cases, which may cause translation distortions in certain situations

settings_option_customTranslatorModule.description: An user defined code that implements a translation module

settings_option_customTranslatorModule_d.message: You can add custom translation modules that use your favorite translation services. Learn more in the <slot id=docs>custom translators documentation</slot>

settings_option_customTranslatorModule_m.description: A button to show list of translation modules

settings_option_history_enable_desc.message: When enabled, translations will be recorded and appear on the <slot id=historyPage>history page</slot>

settings_option_pageTranslation_detectLa.message: Analyze the text on the web page to detect its language. When disabled, the language specified in the <slot id=docs>page metadata</slot> will be used

settings_option_pageTranslation_enableCo.message: Add a button to toggle page translation in the page context menu

settings_option_pageTranslation_excludeS.message: List of CSS selectors for elements to be excluded from translation. One selector per line. If an element matches any of these selectors, its text, attributes, and nested elements will not be translated

settings_option_pageTranslation_lazyTran.message: When this option is enabled, only visible elements will be translated. This option reduces network traffic

settings_option_pageTranslation_original.message: Enable popup with the original text
Show a popup with the original text when hovering over translated text blocks

settings_option_pageTranslation_shortcut.message:
Shortcut to toggle page translation
Press ESC to reset keys

settings_option_pageTranslation_translat.message:
Enter <slot id=htmlAttributes>HTML attribute</slot> names to translate, one attribute per line
Only the attributes in this list will be translated

settings_option_popupTab_pageTranslator_.message: Show a panel with page translation progress in the extension popup

settings_option_selectTranslation_detect.message: When enabled, selected text will be analyzed to detect the language for translation. Otherwise, the page language will be used

settings_option_selectTranslation_enable.message: When this feature is enabled, you can select any text on the page and translate it in a popup

settings_option_selectTranslation_focusO.message: When the translation button appears on the page, it will automatically be focused

settings_option_selectTranslation_isUseA.message: Allow the translation module to detect the text language

When the text language cannot be detected locally and this option is enabled, the text will be translated with the language "auto" if supported.
When the option is disabled, another fallback method will be used to set the source language of the text

settings_option_selectTranslation_modifi.message: Select the keys that must be pressed on the keyboard to display the translation

settings_option_selectTranslation_rememb.message: Remember the most recently selected text language

settings_option_selectTranslation_showOn.message: Show the translation button once per text selection
The button will appear only once for each text selection To show it again, reselect the text

settings_option_selectTranslation_showOr.message: Add a block with the original text to the translation popup

settings_option_selectTranslation_strict.message: Strict mode of text span selection
settings_option_selectTranslation_strict.description: This option is about selecting text via mouse

settings_option_selectTranslation_strict.message: Ignore text span selection if the left mouse button is released outside the block containing the selected text

settings_option_selectTranslation_timeou.message: Delay before hiding the popup button
Delay in milliseconds before hiding the button when the cursor is not hovering over it. Hovering over the button resets the timer. To disable auto-hide, set the value to less than 1

settings_option_selectTranslation_zIndex.message: Increase this value if elements on some pages overlap the popup with translated text

settings_option_textTranslator_rememberT.message: Remembering translated text for the next time the window opens

settings_option_textTranslator_suggestLa.message: When disabled, language suggestions appear only if the source language is set to "auto"

settings_option_translateScheduler_delay.message: The translation scheduler reduces the number of requests to the translation service API by accumulating as many texts as possible to send in a single request. The scheduler will wait for the specified time in milliseconds to gather more texts before starting translation

settings_option_translateScheduler_retry.message: The scheduler will retry translating texts when translation errors occur. This option sets a limit on retry attempts. Set a negative number to allow unlimited retries

settings_option_translatorModule_desc.message: The quality of translations and the available languages depend on the translation module

settings_option_ttsCustomModules_desc.message: You can add speech synthesis modules that use your favorite services and voice engines. Read more in the <slot id=docs>custom TTS documentation</slot>

settings_option_ttsModule_desc.message: Voice engine used for voicing the text

settings_option_userLanguage_desc.message: The language that texts will be translated into

textTranslator_suggestLanguage.message: It seems the text language is <slot id=languageSuggest>$language_name$</slot>

textTranslator_translateInputPlaceholder.description: Request to user input some text for translation

translatorsManagerWindow_emptyTranslator.message: No custom translation modules have been added yet

translatorsManagerWindow_message_transla.message: Are you sure you want to remove the "$translator_name$" translation module?

ttsManagerWindow_message_ttsRemoveConfir.message: Are you sure you want to remove the TTS module "$tts_name$"?

validation_numberBetweenRange.message: Value must be a number between $1 and $2

validation_positiveNumber.message: Value must be a positive number
